inlineContent.text: Add GCCardReaderPlugin to root folder of project directory. Run ‘cordova platform add ios’ if ios platform not added.
Run ‘cordova plugin add GCCardReaderPlugin’ from terminal at root folder. The required frameworks and pods will be added to your project
Add the ‘Privacy - NFC Scan Usage Description’, ‘Privacy - Camera Usage Description’, ‘ISO7816 application identifiers for NFC Tag Reader Session’ and ‘AppLicenseKey’ to the app’s info.plist file.
Add the Near Field Communication Tag Reading capability in the ‘Signing and Capabilities’ section of the app.
Use ‘cordova build ios’ to build the project and the project can be run in XCode and the methods in the plugin can be used using cordova.exec()

abstract.text: Article provides list of steps to integrate GCCardReaderPlugin into the app
GCCardReader is a framework used for the scanning of emirates ID cards using either the NFC capability or the camera
